20101209070707.000|20101209070709.000|CCO|EVEN SARAH PALIN.

20101209070716.000|20101209070717.667|CCO|THEY SAID IT FOLLOWS THE CREDIT 
20101209070717.667|20101209070719.333|CCO|CARD COMPANIES TO CUT OFF THE 
20101209070719.333|20101209070721.000|CCO|WIKILEAKS TIES, HURTING ITS 
20101209070721.000|20101209070723.000|CCO|ABILITY TO RAISE MONEY.
20101209070723.000|20101209070725.000|CCO|PALIN HAS CALLED WIKILEAKS AND 
20101209070725.000|20101209070727.000|CCO|ITS FOUNDER ANTI-AMERICAN.

20101209070729.000|20101209070731.000|CCO|JAIL WITH A NEW EXPEDITION 
20101209070731.000|20101209070733.000|CCO|HEARING NEXT WEEK.

20101209070735.000|20101209070737.000|CCO|TO GET HIM ON BAIL.

20101209070739.000|20101209070741.000|CCO|QUESTION HIM ABOUT RAPE AND 
20101209070741.000|20101209070743.500|CCO|MOLESTATION IN THAT COUNTRY.

20101209070743.500|20101209070746.000|CCO|>>> 30 YEARS AGO TONIGHT, JOHN 
20101209070746.000|20101209070748.500|CCO|LENNON WAS GUNNED DOWN OUTSIDE 
20101209070748.500|20101209070751.000|CCO|HIS APARTMENT BUILDING 
20101209070751.000|20101209070753.000|CCO|MANHATTAN AND EVEN THOUGH 30 
20101209070753.000|20101209070755.000|CCO|YEARS HAVE PASSED, FANS STILL
